column4: argh, linux is 100% headache every single time i try to use it
Crappy old OSes have value in the basically negative sense that changing to new ones makes us wish we'd never been born.

only there's nothing crappy about windows xp. only reason i'm trying to get ubuntu is so that i can say i did, and that worst case scenario it doesn't work out and i can go back to everything just working without needing hours to configure each little thing
